channel.title: Rsps Connection problems Help Please D:
channel.description: i am having problems with connectivity for my source and client... i dont really know whats happening with it... im using port 43594 and local ip in the client.java by the server = i have 127.0.0.1, should i have my no-ip? i can make a server on hamachi with this same port so the port isnt the problem from what im thinking for the port test that i did was i downloaded the allstar client and ran it off my hamachi ip and the port 43594 and it connected and i was on it for a bit, when i try and get my server and client online it doesnt work though... any advise? i do have teamviewer... i need some help thanks in advance

item.title: Rsps Connection problems Help Please D:
item.dc:creator: @pray4urlife pray4urlife
item.description:
@pray4urlife wrote:

You dont have to change that it if you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps Connection problems Help Please D:
item.dc:creator: @tompacman tompacman
item.description:
@tompacman wrote:

ya im not using hamachi i was just doing that as a test i used that with the port 45394 and it let me in so i was wonderin what was wrong with my source… umm im trying what you said now one sec

oh and for the source it says its listening on 127.0.0.1:43594
and it says that for like 5-15 mins before it goes on… anything there that needs fixed/edited in any way?

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps Connection problems Help Please D:
item.dc:creator: @pray4urlife pray4urlife
item.description:
@pray4urlife wrote:

yes search server = and also search server.equals all client sided. If you still can’t connect try changing your firewall were it will except the connections because it could be blocking them. and portforward.

Hamachi sucks… Get rid of it!

just to clerify this
i go to source and change anything in there?
or just go to client, search client.java and then ctrl+f 127.0.0.1 then change the one next to server = to my no-ip?
if somethings wrong there could you tell me? i feel im repeating myself O.o

i am having problems with connectivity for my source and client…

i can make a server on hamachi with this same port so the port isnt the problem from what im thinking
for the port test that i did was i downloaded the allstar client and ran it off my hamachi ip and the port 43594 and it connected and i was on it for a bit, when i try and get my server and client online it doesnt work though…
